alert.note: Alert for Comanche; Cotton; Greer; Harmon; Jackson; Kiowa; Tillman (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 01 at 8:40AM CDT until August 01 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR BREEZY WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY, AND HOT TEMPERATURES FOR SOUTHWESTERN OKLAHOMA AND WESTERN NORTH TEXAS... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY AND HOT TEMPERATURES FOR WESTERN NORTH TEXAS AND SOUTHWEST OKLAHOMA... The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a Red Flag Warning for breezy winds, low humidity, and hot temperatures, which is in effect from noon today to 8 PM CDT this evening. * TIMING...12 pm to 8 pm * WINDS...South 10 to 15 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 18 percent. * TEMPERATURES...105 to 108 degrees * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop could spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is discouraged.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures will contribute to extreme fire behavior. A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
